testcase.name: get all employee details
testcase.system-out: * url 'http://dummy.restapiexample.com' ................................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed Given path '/api/v1/employees' ............................................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And print 'Response is: ', response ....................................... passed And match response contains {"data":[{id:"#notnull","employee_name":"Tiger Nixon","employee_salary":"320800","employee_age":"61","profile_image":""}]} . passed
